entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio IDE tool tips for method parameters do not display all parameters when there is a very large number as it overflows tool tip text limit. #75486
  • Value tracking window doesn't track setting to null value #75485
  • The compiler should report an error about references to out-of-scope stack memory generated by [UnscopedRef], defensively copied struct and pattern matching #75484
  • Regression in .NET 9 RC2: IDE0052 reports false positive with source-generated method #75483
    Backlog

Closed

  • Quick info shows incorrect `Dispose` method when hovering over `using` keyword #75429
    Backlog
  • Old release branch signed builds are broken #74649
    17.12 P3
  • crash on assigning result of a switch expression to a constant #75353
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35410.215 #75481
  • Synthesized backing field generated for non-auto property with `[field:]` attribute #75459

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --sign switch on non-windows platforms #75491
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not pin the Compilers.Toolset version #75488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test case for analyzer dependency loading #75487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Build and publish .ni.pdb for R2R images #75489
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve quick info on `using` keyword #75462
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [release/dev17.10] Merge from internal 17.10 #75471
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update "first-class Span" feature status #75474
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Field-backed properties: [field:] should not be considered a backing field reference #75461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • VB: Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to net9.0 #75465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.11] Merge from internal 17.11 #75472
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.8] Merge from internal 17.8 #75468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
